Strings.String: Microsoft SQL Server Data-Tier Application Framework (x64)
You do not have the permissions required to install Microsoft SQL Server Data-Tier Application Framework (x64). Please contact your administrator.
An error occurred attempting to install Microsoft SQL Server Data-Tier Application Framework (x64).
The current operating system version does not support Microsoft SQL Server Data-Tier Application Framework (x64).

The current operating system does not meet Service Pack level requirements for Microsoft SQL Server Data-Tier Application Framework (x64). Install the most recent Service Pack from the Microsoft download center at http://www.microsoft.com/downloads before continuing setup.
